column5: Mi casa es su casa. I travel often so my loss is your gain. Use my spare bedroom in a Two Bedroom w/1 full bath cozy apartment. It's perfect for the weekend traveler or business person that needs access to the golf course while here on business. Conveniently located in Dallas' most sought after neighborhood, Lakewood, made popular by its exhilarating foliage. Also close to the medical district if you're here for your medical school/ residency interviews.
